title: Interpretation of seeing a wedding dress in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a fiancée: When an engaged girl sees in a dream that she is wearing a white dress, she may face problems with her partner and be dissatisfied with this relationship, but if her relationship is good with her partner, problems may or may not arise between them. Marriage, but if the girl finds herself searching for a wedding dress on her wedding day and cannot find the right one, she often goes through a state of loss, anxiety, and distraction. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a single womanIf a girl sees that she is searching for a wedding dress and finds a beautiful dress in the dream after searching , it means that she will have a good time in her life and will meet new people who will support her like friends. Or a partner, and it is likely that she will accept a new job and it will be a good job for her. If the Virgo girl sees herself wearing a wedding dress and feels happy and cheerful while wearing it, this indicates that she will get married soon and her partner will be a good man with high morals and high status. But if the girl sees herself trying Wearing a wedding dress and wearing it, she will marry a religious man of good character. But if the girl sees herself wearing a wedding dress C and pain and firmness appear in the dream, this indicates that there is a good person who admires her who will abandon his admiration and lose a good marriage relationship. And if the girl sees herself She is wearing a white dress and the groom is famous and he seemed happy in the dream, then this indicates a great benefit that will happen to the girl. Dream wedding dress for a man If a man sees that he is marrying a girl wearing a beautiful white dress in a dream, and the girl is famous, then this indicates a good arrival. But if a man sees Himself marries an unknown man who wears an ugly dress, then this indicates the evil that befalls him, whether it is illness or loss of money, and it may indicate the approach of his guardianship. But if a person sees himself marrying a bride in a beautiful dress, and friends and relatives gathered around him and married him with joy and happiness, then this indicates He has a good reputation among the people and appears to be a man of religion and morals. May God increase his faith and people’s love for him.

title: Interpretation of seeing a jacket in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a jacket in a dream, there is no doubt that the jacket is considered one of the most luxurious and luxurious clothes of all time, so many people prefer to wear it, as it is available in the markets constantly and in all seasons of the year. In addition to that, the year has many and varied uses such as in winter it is warm and a jacket, but in the summer it can also be worn because it adds elegance and beauty, so it becomes possible to appear in a dream in a jacket, and thus the viewer becomes curious whether this vision has an interpretation or not, and this is what we will discover in this article by presenting an interpretation of seeing a jacket in a dream. Seeing a jacket in a dream by Ibn Sirin Clothes of all kinds and shapes have always been necessary in reality, so it is natural for them to dominate the dream, and we will see the opinion of the interpreter Ibn Sirin on this vision: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a jacket, this expresses the kindness of her husband, as he is a fortress for her from problems and worries. As for if a woman sees that she is wearing a jacket in her dream, but it is intended for a man. The vision indicates the positive traits of this lady, so that she is strong in speech and faces difficulties. There is no doubt that an unmarried girl sees a beautiful jacket in a dream, this may indicate her marriage to a kind and wonderful person. Thus, she spends a happy and happy life with him based on respect, affection and mercy. In general, a girl’s vision of a jacket is a sign of her close relationship And her marriage. Sometimes this dream expresses the dreamer's need for calm, reassurance and psychological comfort. While if there is a woolen jacket in the vision, this certainly indicates the great wealth that the dreamer will acquire. If the dreamer wears his jacket in a dream, this indicates failure in something he intends to do. Interpretation of seeing a jacket in a dream See also: Interpretation of a dream about a red jacket in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a jacket for a pregnant woman Many dreams occur in a pregnant woman's dream, some of them are frightening dreams, and others are reassuring. As for seeing a jacket in her dream, this is interpreted as follows: If the pregnant woman’s jacket that she wears in her sleep is beautiful and elegant. Certainly, the vision reflects the ease of her movement, the ease of her birth, and the peaceful passage of all these difficulties. However, if the jacket is old so that she fixes it in a dream, this indicates her stress during pregnancy. However, if the pregnant woman sees that someone gave her a woolen jacket. It also indicates that she is approaching her date of birth and the birth of a righteous and moral child. If the pregnant woman wears her husband’s jacket in a dream, this indicates that her child is male. Seeing her wearing a jacket in her dream means that her fears are gone and her husband will help her. However, if he is wearing a tight jacket in the dream, this is a sign that he has committed sins and transgressions and needs to repent and seek forgiveness. In addition, when she buys a new jacket in a dream, this is a sign that her date of birth is approaching and that she and her husband will have a lot to live for. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black clothes in a dream and its effects Interpretation of a dream about a jacket for a married woman Women always try to choose what they

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big white house

preview.html: Dreaming of entering the white house indicates the new life that the dreamer will accept in his life during this period. Interpretation of seeing a spacious white house in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried woman sees that she is entering a spacious white house in a dream, and in the dream she felt great comfort and happiness. The meaning here indicates that This single woman will experience a lot of good things in her life. She will get rid of all the problems and bad things that she is going through. What if an unmarried woman saw in a dream that she was looking for a spacious white house, but she did not find it in the dream and was sad. It indicates that during this Time is going through some problems in her life. She is trying to find a way out or something that will save her from these problems. Either an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she entered a spacious white house in a dream, and sat in it for a long time. This means that she will marry a good and righteous man. He will make her happy Very important in her life and she will live with him comfortably, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams of an old, dirty houseInterpretation of seeing a spacious white house in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman saw in a dream that her husband was giving her a spacious white house in a dream, and she was very happy with him in the dream. It appears that The dreamer will live a happy life at this time. He will go through many good things, God willing. The married woman who sees the spacious white house in a dream, wants to live in it, and was very happy with it in the dream. The meaning here indicates that this married woman will be free from all problems. Which she is going through at this time in her life, God willing. And seeing that a married woman was sitting inside the spacious white house and it was hers in a dream, and she was happy sitting in it. It explains that this married woman will be freed from all sins and mistakes in her life and that God will make things easy for her in Life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a spacious white house in a dream for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees in a dream that she is sitting in a large white house. This was the first time she saw him in a dream, and he looked handsome in the dream. This means that this divorced woman will get rid of all the problems that She will experience it at this time in her life, God willing. As for the divorced woman who dreamed that she was buying a large white house in a dream and was happy to sit in it for a long time. It appears here that this divorced woman will experience many good things and food in her life and be freed from all sorrows, God willing. A divorced woman who dreams that she enters a spacious house and walks around in it for a long time in the dream while she is happy. Here it appears that she has been liberated from all the sins and transgressions that she committed in her life. And that God Almighty will reward her with goodness in her life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a large and spacious house for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a house. The big white house in a man’s dream and its meaning. If the dreamer saw in a dream that she was buying a big, spacious white house in the dream, and she was very happy with it in the dream. I hope that Fidel gets rid of all the problems that he is going through at this time. And that she begins a new life full of peace and tranquility, God willing. And the dreamer in the dream is searching

title: Interpretation of seeing a set of glasses in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a set of glasses in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com. Or it could be a warning or warning of the emergence of evil, and the interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a set of glasses, whether it is a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, with different meanings. Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a set of glasses in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing glasses in an unmarried girl’s dream is good news for her that her dreams and desires will come true. Dreaming of glass cups filled with water in an unmarried woman’s dream announcing her marriage. Seeing empty glasses In a dream, it expresses a feeling of loneliness. A full set of glasses for a married woman is considered a sign of pregnancy. Dreaming of broken glasses is an indication that there are many problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. A dream about broken cups is a sign of fatigue and suffering. See also: Interpretation of washing cups in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about new cups for a married woman: Dream of cups New cups for a married woman denote many good things that come to the dreamer. New cups in a married woman’s dream symbolize happiness and stability in her life with her husband. Seeing complete new cups in a married woman’s dream shows her pregnancy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets Interpretation of a dream about buying new cups for single women: Buying new cups in a single woman’s dream indicates her sense of security and stability. Dreaming of new single cups indicates her good luck and her imminent engagement. Looking at the single glass cup is a sign of the fulfillment of dreams. What is the interpretation of a dream about plastic cups: Dreaming about plastic cups in a dream indicates the viewer’s superficiality and lack of interest in external phenomena. Only things. Seeing plastic cups in a dream indicates the dreamer’s stupidity and inability to make decisions. See also: Interpretation of seeing washing hair in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming about giving an empty cup: Dreaming of an empty cup in a dream indicates boredom or a feeling of loneliness. Seeing an empty cup in a dream may It symbolizes new events occurring in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of giving an empty cup to someone in a dream indicates the loss or loss of a friend. Dreaming of drinking an empty cup is a sample of his good luck. See also: Interpretation of washing clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream in which a glass cup falls: Dreaming of a glass cup falling in a dream And its breaking is a death notice for the fortuneteller. Seeing a broken cup in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s failure and loss. Interpretation of a dream about an empty glass bowl: Seeing an empty glass bowl in a dream that resembles an empty cup indicates psychological instability, sadness and loneliness. Empty dream cups are a sign of useless relationships in the life of the fortuneteller. Also, a dream about empty vessels indicates To the inability to achieve dreams. Seeing an empty bowl in a single person’s dream indicates an elusive girl. See also: Interpretation of washing cups in a dream. We are pleased to see on the site the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of seeing a set of glasses in a dream”, through the comments and the dream team will interpret your dream Otherwise

title: Interpretation of seeing ice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans The interpretation of seeing snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi shows the owner of a good harvest and a lot of food, because he feels cheerful and happy and depends on the amount of ice cream purchased, which makes waking life fly with joy and joy. Happiness, like young children, indicates the stability of marital life between the two partners. To see ice cream in a dream dissolved and incoherent, which symbolizes many crises and problems that the dreamer is going through. If the taste of ice cream is wonderful, this is a sign of self-realization and the desires and aspirations of the desired opinion. To dream of many young children eating good and delicious ice cream means that good news, joy and fun will follow. Spoiled ice cream in a dream. Its pungent smell symbolizes a bad psychological state and a feeling of tension, sadness and failure in various fields. I saw a lot of ice cream in a dream, but I cannot Eating it, it symbolizes disappointment, a feeling of despair and suffering from many things in one’s life. The symbol of ice cream in a single woman’s dream. Eating a carton of ice cream and it was new in the dream after he broke the first bunch and revealed again the engagement and you are very happy. I dreamed that I spoiled the ice cream. My cream, this indicates that her engagement has ended and she does not want to continue. A girl buying ice cream in a dream indicates the soonest engagement date. I ate ice cream in a dream when I was alone, because it was delicious. The dream indicates the happy days that she will experience in the next period of her life. Delicious fruit flavored ice cream is a sign of achieving goals and desires in one’s life. Eating ice cream in a dream that tastes good is a dream that symbolizes stress, sadness, and sorrow. You buy fresh and delicious ice cream. Disgust in a dream An unmarried girl indicates engagement and dating, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the symbol of ice in a dream by Al-Osaimi. Eating ice cream in a dream means that the dreamer will soon be lucky. Melting it and not eating it in the dream indicates sadness and betrayal of loved ones. Eating it in a dream and having good taste is a sign of love. And success in many areas of your life. Seeing ice cream in a dream means hearing good and happy news about the dreamer. Also, its spoilage in the dream indicates wrong and wrong decisions. The taste of ice cream is bad, a sign that you need to think and think about all your affairs and not rush. Interpretation Snow White Market for SinglesYou bought vanilla ice cream in a dream. It indicates beautiful things that are happening in your life. Buying white ice cream in a dream indicates an enjoyable conversation between the two partners. White snow also indicates that you are earning money without fatigue or effort. Red strawberry ice cream symbolizes Passion and love between two partners. In general, ice cream in a dream for one girl indicates happiness and beautiful things in her life. But if he buys ice cream and shows it to the fiancé in the dream, this indicates that there will be disagreements and annoyances that will disappear, thank God. The taste and smell of ice cream is unpleasant and unpleasant.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpreter

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a broken tooth in a dream, according to the Nabulsi interpreter, is that a broken tooth is one of the things that many people do not like, and seeing it in a dream causes fear and anxiety for the viewer, which prompts him to search for an explanation, and the interpretation relates to this matter. It is worth noting that broken teeth in a dream carry a bad omen and that one of the visions The afflicted and harmless, and one of the interpreters predicted that his interpretation indicates that there is a bad chase for the dreamer, and there is a group of interpretations and interpretations related to the dream of broken teeth, which differ according to the social status of the viewer, and in our article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of a broken tooth in Nabulsi’s dream.Interpretation of the dream of broken teeth Tooth in a dream by Al-Nabulsi There are many explanations and interpretations related to seeing broken teeth in a dream, as they are classified as one of the ominous visions, which carry a bad omen for the dreamer’s life, and in the following points we present to you some of these indicators, including: If the tooth is found broken and falls into His hand or the stone and he did not lose it, this indicates the meaning of an extended, long life and full of luck. In addition to his interpretation of the dream in which he lost it and did not see it again, this indicates the loss of someone close to the family, God forbid. In the event of a fracture it is indicated by the appearance of blood or pain, Because most people say that the blood that appears with a broken tooth is a difficult event, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. It also indicates the loss of materials that affect the fortuneteller. There are other sayings about breaking many teeth that can indicate many conflicts that will affect the person in his life in a way. Continuous, whether with his friends or family. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a white snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing broken teeth in a dream for a single girl. The interpretation of seeing broken teeth in a dream varies depending on the social status of the viewer. Each of them has different life circumstances in which it differs from the other, and its interpretation varies depending on The events narrated by the fortune teller. And we will show you the most important of them: Broken teeth in the dream of an engaged girl indicate that this engagement will not be completed and will soon break up. In addition, the broken tooth of the engaged tooth in a dream indicates the loss of a loved and dear person to the owner of the dream. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a bronze monkey in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website gives you the interpretation of seeing a bronze Babur in a complete dream and seeing Babur in a complete dream indicates betrayal and bad methods that occur in reality. Big, many, many, and we have collected for you all the interpretations from the books of interpretation and great visions, and here, dear followers, we will present to you seeing a bronze baboon in a dream for a pregnant married woman, men. The complete interpretation of seeing a bronze baboon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The complete interpretation of Babur al-Nahhas in a dream indicates The worries will end, but after fatigue, hardship, and the interruption of life, and God knows best. This also indicates a large number of burdens, worries, and transgressions, as well as strife between the family and the cultivation of hatred between relatives, and God knows best. This vision also indicates dealing with violence and indicates a corrupt marriage for an ordinary man or girl. And he will live a vain life. Interpretation of seeing a bronze monkey in a complete dream for a common woman: Dreaming of a woman’s vessel with copper needles means that she will soon marry an unsuitable young man and she will not be satisfied with him because he is not suitable. Also, seeing a copper pipe shows the many sins that the dreamer commits in his life, and shows his many worries. And God knows best. This vision also indicates achieving goals and achieving success, distinction, and ambitions after great difficulties and hardships in life. Interpretation of seeing a whole bronze monkey in a dream for a married woman. Seeing buying a bronze baboon means that she will achieve her goals and that her husband will be in good health and join a new and prestigious job. This vision also indicates travel abroad, the psychological discomfort that the woman will feel, and many marital disputes. This vision also indicates that she will soon become pregnant with a male child who will become incapacitated and become seriously ill with a disease that will not leave her. Complete interpretation of seeing a bronze monkey in a dream for a woman Pregnant: If a pregnant woman dreams that she sees a copper door and cleans it, this is a good omen, a good birth, and a child free of diseases, and God knows best. This vision also indicates achieving goals and achieving success and academic excellence for her children and her future son, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bronze monkey in a dream for a man: If a married man sees in a dream that he is buying a copper pipe, this indicates the collapse of the disputes that arise between him and his wife. And it indicates that things will become easier. This lung symbolizes the marriage of a sweet young man to a pious and obedient wife who obeys him and God in all matters of this world and life. Also, seeing copper and shards in a dream indicates self-development, a desire for what is not permissible and what is forbidden, and a lot of disobedience. And disobedience. The complete interpretation of seeing copper in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream a hut made of copper, this indicates the collapse of his worries and anxiety and the healing of all the diseases that he suffers from, and God knows best. And when a foreigner dreams of buying Yunus’ dream of copper, this indicates the arrival of sustenance, lawful matters, and abundance. If you have a dream that you want Explain it, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a phone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a telephone in a dream or a dream through a website. The vision of the website roy2a.com considers the telephone a means of voice communication used by many people. It has been developed since the invention of the telephone in 1876 and until today it has become a mobile phone and is used in various places, and other features have been added to it except for the means of Audio communication through which anyone can know what is happening around the world. The telephone is considered one of the most important human inventions. Seeing a telephone in a dream has many interpretations spoken by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing a telephone in a dream. Seeing a telephone in a dream means about the appearance of things that he deems necessary for him. It also indicates that you see a phone in a dream to hear new and happy news. Buying a phone in a dream. A good vision indicates the arrival of sustenance and goodness in the life of the dreamer. Stealing a phone in a dream indicates that the viewer will be exposed to losses and problems. Losing a phone in a dream. An unpleasant vision indicates a defect in goals. Which the dreamer seeks to achieve. Interpretation of seeing a phone in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a phone in a single woman’s dream indicates her close relationship and acquaintance with a person who proposes to her. If you see that you are sending a message via the phone, this indicates the presence of one person in the dream who will face problems in her near life. Seeing talking on the phone with a stranger in one girl’s dream indicates that this was happy good news that her wedding day is near. Seeing a broken phone in one dream indicates problems and sorrows in her life. Interpretation of seeing a phone in a dream for a married woman. Seeing buying a phone in a dream for a married woman is an indication of a happy life. And the stability that she enjoys at home and with her husband. Seeing yourself talking on the phone indicates the presence of a married woman who feels happy that she will soon announce the news of her pregnancy. Seeing cracks or fractures in the phone indicates the presence of a married woman who is exposed to problems and disagreements in her life or with her husband. Interpretation of seeing the phone In a pregnant woman’s dream, seeing a conversation on the phone in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will lose fatigue, pain, and enjoyment of her health and that of her fetus. Seeing the phone ringing in a pregnant woman’s dream is good for the ringing to be normal and not disturbed by anything. As for seeing the phone ringing in a pregnant woman’s dream? What is noteworthy is that an unpleasant vision portends an unpleasant vision. With the appearance of evil, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a phone in a man’s dream. Seeing buying a new phone in a man’s dream indicates changes in his life for the better in the coming period. And a black phone in a dream indicates victories, excellence and success. Buying a red phone in a man’s dream is a sign of his imminent marriage. Seeing a broken phone in a dream A man indicates the corruption of his relationships with the people around him. If you see a burning phone in a dream, this indicates that about exposing the viewer to temptation or committing sins and misdeeds. Seeing a wound while communicating on the phone in a dream indicates that the dreamer has reason to worry and fear in his professional life. Losing a phone in a dream About a man, indicating his failure or loss

title: Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Depending on what it symbolizes and what the interpreter indicates, Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a chameleon is an abomination based on the answer to the word chameleon in its origin, which is divided into war and epidemic, in addition to the word used in Persian. As an expression of devastation and devastation, you may also be able to recognize entering the house of the dead in a dream. Some books indicate that the term chameleon means fighting the sun, and symbolizes increasing tyranny, lack of knowledge, and fighting the truth. Some base their point of interpretation of chameleons on their behavior, as they are characterized With a special talent, which is to hide through camouflage and replace its color according to its location. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women. The presence of a deceptive personality and lack of kindness with the increase in difficult and arbitrary life. All of this is known to people who have crossed About the chameleon. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a single woman. The white color expresses kindness, security, and calm, although there may be a period of instability. While the green chameleon has its own signs in expressing the rule of peace, good news, and increasing goodness. It also indicates understanding and sometimes indicates the absence of conspirators. Bad people and on easy days. It is said that the red chameleon warns you that you must rethink the decisions you wish to make so that you do not regret them due to the haste, impulsiveness and anger that the red color of the chameleon expresses. Some believe that gray as a chameleon color symbolizes the need to look at A topic that you feel confused about in a different way, and the need to break out of the unified vision through which you look. The black chameleon symbolizes the hatred and hostility that occurs between dreamers and some people, in addition to the presence of those who intend to harm or express unpleasant news. Read also: Vision 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman. The chameleon has some pleasant connotations, such as slaughter in a dream, which indicates the end of a difficult period. It agrees with the singular in its interpretation if it is green, which indicates understanding and peace. It has a different meaning if he sees it eating, and if it eats From her home, this does not deserve praise. The interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a pregnant woman does not differ much from its interpretation for an unmarried and married woman. In addition, it indicates that the newborn is a male if it is black. Some women may panic for fear of the interpretation of seeing a chameleon, but It becomes clear to us that it has many meanings. The interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream cannot be limited to single, married, and pregnant women only, but this in itself carries some signs and indications that are generally unintended, and we will present some of them in several short points. Read also: Talking to the dead In a dream, what does a chameleon symbolize in general? It represents a person who is good at hiding facts and following lies and is usually a hypocrite.

title: Interpretation of seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream according to the insightful situation and its circumstances and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the vision website we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream? Seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream shows the extent of the girl’s shortcomings in her mother’s right not to help her with anything. Seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream may show that she is distant from her Lord and doing many wrong things in her life. Seeing a girl beating her mother who lives in a dream says that she must respect her mother and always help her in all matters. Seeing a girl beating that she died in a dream indicates her mother’s need to pray for mercy and forgiveness for her and give her charity. See also: Interpretation of seeing being beaten in a dream. Interpretation of a girl’s dream She hits her mother with a stick. Seeing a girl hitting her mother in a dream indicates the mother’s resentment towards the girl for mistreatment and her anger towards her. Seeing a girl hitting her dead mother in a dream indicates that the girl does not pray for her mother. Interpretation of a dream about a mother who is upset with her daughter in a dream: Seeing the mother’s anger towards her daughter in a dream. This vision is considered as A warning to her to abandon the sins and disobedience that she is committing in her life. Seeing a dead mother grieving over her daughter in a dream indicates that the seer will face serious health problems next season, and God knows best. Seeing a mother getting angry and screaming at her daughter in a dream indicates that the sighted woman will be exposed to an illness, but she will be cured of it. It will be quickly, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a child crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hitting a mother in the face. Seeing a mother being slapped in the face in a dream states that the dreamer always goes against his mother’s orders and desires and does not care about what she says. Some interpreters interpreted that seeing a mother hitting her face in The dream indicates that the visionary person is very concerned for his mother and always runs when he needs help. Interpretation of seeing a mother hitting her daughter in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a mother hitting her daughter in a dream shows the extent of the mother’s fear for her daughter. Seeing a dead mother hitting her daughter in a dream indicates a mother who leaves an inheritance to her daughter. Seeing a mother beating her daughter in a dream without pain shows that the girl always obeys her mother’s orders and does not listen to her. See also: Interpretation of seeing a person running in a dream. Interpretation of seeing being beaten in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman being beaten and rejoicing in a dream. It indicates Many worries and sorrows in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman who is known to hit her in a dream shows that she will marry this person soon. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, a familiar person, hitting her with a stick indicates that this person
